title: Gloria
creator_credit: John Cassavetes, Sam Shaw and Columbia Pictures
brief_description: An accountant in possession of a ledger that could convict a number of Mob “bosses” entrusts both the ledger and his son to Gloria for protection before being murdered. Reluctantly she takes the child and begins a life on the run while keeping the mob at bay. Gena Rowlands gives an outstanding performance in the title role that earned her an Oscar nomination.
